strings.Value: "It's time to lay down our heads and get some rest."
"It's good we can rest while our friends watch the camp."
"Exhaustion is good for meditation. When the body is weak, the soul is more attuned."
"I recommend you to start reading before you go to sleep. And for the sake of all the gods of Golarion, choose some serious reading!"
"I've no idea how you manage. Wearing that heavy armor all day â€” and you always walk in front!"
"You get tired so fast! That's because you longshanks. You spend too much strength to move those big long legs of yours!"
